about_the_game:
Humble Beginnings

This demo only includes the first area of the world, with only the first boss to fight. But hopefully by the end of the demo, you'll see how the game will branch out from this point and offer you a multitude of ways to experience the game in a way that is unique to you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: intel Core i3 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 (integrated graphics)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Not required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHZ Quad Core Processor Or Higher
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870 or equivalent
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device

short_description: A brief encounter with the first boss of the game. Enjoy exploring the first world area and test your skills against the first boss with your wrench and offhand powers. Feel free to open up the developer tools as well to see information on how the code is running.
